title: Lupin launches generic drug in US market
description: The Mumbai-based drug maker has introduced the medication after receiving an approval from the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA), Lupin said in a statement.Lupin launches generic drug in US market
content: Drug maker Lupin on Monday said it has launched Mirabegron extended-release tablets (25 mg) in the US market. The Mumbai-based drug maker has introduced the medication after receiving an approval from the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA), Lupin said in a statement. The company's product is a generic equivalent of Astellas Pharma Global Development, Inc's Myrbetriq extended-release tablets, it added. Lupin shares were trading 3.38 percent up at Rs 1,599.35 apiece on the BSE.
